channel.title: Java Bug System
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JDK-8219810] javac throws NullPointerException
item.description:
ADDITIONAL SYSTEM INFORMATION :
Linux 4.15.0-43-generic #46~16.04.1-Ubuntu SMP Fri Dec 7 13:31:08 UTC 2018 x86_64

A DESCRIPTION OF THE PROBLEM :
$ javac -version
javac 1.8.0_191

$ cat Test.java
class Test {
    static Object test(android.content.pm.PackageParser.Package p) {
        return p.requestedPermissions;
    }
}

$ javac -cp ~framework.jar.dedex.jar Test.java
An exception has occurred in the compiler (1.8.0_191). Please file a bug against the Java compiler via the Java bug reporting page (http://bugreport.java.com) after checking the Bug Database (http://bugs.java.com) for duplicates. Include your program and the following diagnostic in your report. Thank you.
java.lang.NullPointerException
at com.sun.tools.javac.code.Symbol$ClassSymbol.isSubClass(Symbol.java:1020)
at com.sun.tools.javac.comp.Lower.accessClass(Lower.java:1108)
at com.sun.tools.javac.comp.Lower.accessSymbol(Lower.java:983)
at com.sun.tools.javac.comp.Lower.access(Lower.java:1220)
at com.sun.tools.javac.comp.Lower.visitSelect(Lower.java:3855)
at com.sun.tools.javac.tree.JCTree$JCFieldAccess.accept(JCTree.java:1897)
at com.sun.tools.javac.tree.TreeTranslator.translate(TreeTranslator.java:58)
at com.sun.tools.javac.comp.Lower.translate(Lower.java:2371)
at com.sun.tools.javac.comp.Lower.translate(Lower.java:2382)
at com.sun.tools.javac.comp.Lower.visitReturn(Lower.java:3588)
at com.sun.tools.javac.tree.JCTree$JCReturn.accept(JCTree.java:1384)
at com.sun.tools.javac.tree.TreeTranslator.translate(TreeTranslator.java:58)
at com.sun.tools.javac.comp.Lower.translate(Lower.java:2371)
at com.sun.tools.javac.tree.TreeTranslator.translate(TreeTranslator.java:70)
at com.sun.tools.javac.tree.TreeTranslator.visitBlock(TreeTranslator.java:162)
at com.sun.tools.javac.comp.Lower.visitBlock(Lower.java:3561)
at com.sun.tools.javac.tree.JCTree$JCBlock.accept(JCTree.java:909)
at com.sun.tools.javac.tree.TreeTranslator.translate(TreeTranslator.java:58)
at com.sun.tools.javac.comp.Lower.translate(Lower.java:2371)
at com.sun.tools.javac.tree.TreeTranslator.visitMethodDef(TreeTranslator.java:145)
at com.sun.tools.javac.comp.Lower.visitMethodDefInternal(Lower.java:2828)
at com.sun.tools.javac.comp.Lower.visitMethodDef(Lower.java:2737)
at com.sun.tools.javac.tree.JCTree$JCMethodDecl.accept(JCTree.java:778)
at com.sun.tools.javac.tree.TreeTranslator.translate(TreeTranslator.java:58)
at com.sun.tools.javac.comp.Lower.translate(Lower.java:2371)
at com.sun.tools.javac.comp.Lower.visitClassDef(Lower.java:2508)
at com.sun.tools.javac.tree.JCTree$JCClassDecl.accept(JCTree.java:693)
at com.sun.tools.javac.tree.TreeTranslator.translate(TreeTranslator.java:58)
at com.sun.tools.javac.comp.Lower.translate(Lower.java:2371)
at com.sun.tools.javac.comp.Lower.translate(Lower.java:2390)
at com.sun.tools.javac.comp.Lower.translateTopLevelClass(Lower.java:3932)
at com.sun.tools.javac.main.JavaCompiler.desugar(JavaCompiler.java:1512)
at com.sun.tools.javac.main.JavaCompiler.desugar(JavaCompiler.java:1356)
at com.sun.tools.javac.main.JavaCompiler.compile2(JavaCompiler.java:901)
at com.sun.tools.javac.main.JavaCompiler.compile(JavaCompiler.java:860)
at com.sun.tools.javac.main.Main.compile(Main.java:523)
at com.sun.tools.javac.main.Main.compile(Main.java:381)
at com.sun.tools.javac.main.Main.compile(Main.java:370)
at com.sun.tools.javac.main.Main.compile(Main.java:361)
at com.sun.tools.javac.Main.compile(Main.java:56)
at com.sun.tools.javac.Main.main(Main.java:42)

$

STEPS TO FOLLOW TO REPRODUCE THE PROBLEM :
clone this git repo: https://gist.github.com/Lanchon/383f05664d59b096dc9d58ba32cdd667
and run: ./repro.sh


---------- BEGIN SOURCE ----------
https://gist.github.com/Lanchon/383f05664d59b096dc9d58ba32cdd667
---------- END SOURCE ----------

FREQUENCY : always

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Changeset: 44be5edf
Author: Archie L. Cobbs <archie.cobbs@gmail.com>
Committer: Vicente Romero <vromero@openjdk.org>
Date: 2023-01-04 17:50:32 +0000
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/commit/44be5edf5aa661169c665aa9386e5930a3632524

A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/pull/10826
Date: 2022-10-21 22:30:27 +0000

One thing to note is that the android.content.pm.PackageParser.Package.requestedPermissions field has modifiers "private protected", which is obviously illegal. If it would be either private or protected, javac would reject the source file with a compile-time error, but with the combination, the error recovery causes it to not produce an error, and then it crashes in backend.

Probably the cleanest solution is to reject the illegal classfile.

Received similar issue JI-9059937. After verification, I am able to reproduce this issue on jdk13 ea b15 also
==
-sh-4.2$ /scratch/fairoz/JAVA/jdk13/jdk-13-ea+15/bin/javac -cp ./_framework.jar.dedex.jar Test.java
An exception has occurred in the compiler (13-ea). Please file a bug against the Java compiler via the Java bug reporting page (http://bugreport.java.com) after checking the Bug Database (http://bugs.java.com) for duplicates. Include your program, the following diagnostic, and the parameters passed to the Java compiler in your report. Thank you.
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at jdk.compiler/com.sun.tools.javac.code.Symbol$ClassSymbol.isSubClass(Symbol.java:1309)

Issue is reproducible in all JDK 8, 13-ea+9.

>javac -cp ~framework.jar.dedex.jar Test.java
An exception has occurred in the compiler (13-ea). Please file a bug against the Java compiler via the Java bug reporting page (http://bugreport.java.com) after checking the Bug Database (http://bugs.java.com) for duplicates. Include your program, the following diagnostic, and the parameters passed to the Java compiler in your report. Thank you.
